title: 📢 112-1 The first " Dong Hwa Friday Night" outdoor performance event - "Hee Ha Ha Weekly Dance" will be on 3/15!
author: 余惠真
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處課外活動組 - 余惠真 - nacy4631@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6232
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 📢 112-1 The first " Dong Hwa Friday Night" outdoor performance event - "Hee Ha Ha Weekly Dance" will be on 3/15!
日期： Mon, 11 Mar 2024 08:50:10 +0800
附檔： 海報1.jpg (271 KB)   LINE_ALBUM_海報手宣留存處！_240308_1.jpg (257 KB)   
📢Hello fellow students!
❤️The first Friday Night of this semester, with a unique style of music, realizes the spirit of rap, shows superb skills, and takes everyone into the hip-hop world of " Hip Hop Club"!
Use the most enthusiastic and unrestrained attitude, enjoy the rhythm, use cool dance skills, and let's fall into the charm of "Hot Dance Club" together!
✨Dazzling lights and gorgeous sparks, "Fire Dance Club" combines power and beauty to bring a dazzling visual feast to the audience!
 
🌟3/15 (Friday) There will be wonderful performances by Hip Hop Club, Hot Dance Club, and Fire Dance Club. Don’t miss it (*^o^*)
————————————————————
We sincerely invite everyone to come
Have a nice night 🎆 ✨

📍Event time: 6:30~8:30 pm on Friday, March 15th (entry at 18:00) 🫶
📍Event location: East Community House(Ji-Xian)
The Student Activities Division invites you~~🫶
